name: Join Us (Zeta2099)
description:
Join Us is a FPS Horror game created for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2021 Game Jam. Navigate a spooky maze and kill the humans that have been joined with a deadly parasite and transformed into monsters. 

Game made by Zeta Zimmer using the Godot engine.

Art made by Zeta Zimmer using Aseprite.

Special thanks to Miziziziz and the YouTube Godot community.

Music, "Save the City", by Abstraction. See more of their music at http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/) or (http://www.abstractionmusic.com/).

Sound effects by Mixkit.co.
